name: Shah Abbasi round flower
description:
We can see the first examples of round flowers on Neolithic artifacts. The roundness of these flowers and their movement has been considered as a symbol of time, planets and celestial bodies and a sacred element. 
We can see many examples of these flowers in the Persian carpets.
